articles.title: 'Kannagi' Review: Keerthi Pandian, Ammu Abhirami's film is a convoluted mess - India Today
articles.description: Director Yashwanth Kishore's 'Kannagi', starring Ammu Abhirami, Shaalin Zoya, Vidhya Pradeep and Keerthi Pandian, aims to portray the struggles of a woman at different stages of life. But, it falls short by miles, says our review.
articles.content: The trailer of 'Kannagi' generated a positive buzz on social media. It's about four women, who are in different stages of their lives and struggling with it being oppressed by the men or the society.… [+2973 chars]
